abstract: Follow our organization on GitHub to stay updated with our latest projects and announcements
description: Show your support by following our organization on GitHub. This helps you stay informed about new releases, updates, and community events.
instructions:
1. Go to our GitHub organization page
2. Click the 'Follow' button
3. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Follow Our Organization

abstract: Star our main repository to show your appreciation and keep track of our project
description: Give us a star on GitHub! This helps increase our project's visibility and shows your support for open source development.
instructions:
1. Visit our main repository on GitHub
2. Click the 'Star' button
3. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Star Our Repository

abstract: Follow our project maintainer to get insights into development and community updates
description: Connect with our project maintainer on GitHub to stay updated with development insights, community announcements, and behind-the-scenes content.
instructions:
1. Visit our maintainer's GitHub profile
2. Click the 'Follow' button
3. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Follow Our Maintainer

abstract: Create your first issue to contribute to our project and help improve it
description: Help us improve our project by creating an issue. This could be a bug report, feature request, or documentation improvement. Every issue helps make our project better!
instructions:
1. Go to our repository's Issues tab
2. Click 'New Issue'
3. Create a meaningful issue (bug report, feature request, etc.)
4. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Create Your First Issue

abstract: Open a pull request to contribute code and help shape the future of our project
description: Take your contribution to the next level by opening a pull request. This could be a bug fix, new feature, or documentation update. Code contributions are highly valued!
instructions:
1. Fork our repository
2. Make your changes
3. Create a pull request
4. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Open a Pull Request

abstract: Watch our repository to receive notifications about all activities and stay engaged
description: Stay fully engaged with our project by watching the repository. You'll receive notifications about issues, pull requests, releases, and other activities.
instructions:
1. Go to our repository on GitHub
2. Click the 'Watch' button
3. Choose your notification preferences
4. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Watch Our Repository

abstract: Make any type of contribution to our project and become part of our community
description: Contribute to our project in any way you can! This could be opening issues, creating pull requests, making commits, or any other form of contribution. Every bit helps!
instructions:
1. Contribute to our project in any way (issue, PR, commit, etc.)
2. Enter your GitHub username below to verify
name: Make Any Contribution
